categories: Category:First Order Department of Military Research products

nodes.text: The IT-000 interrogator droid was a next generation interrogator droid used by the First Order. A corruption of medical droid tech, it harked back to an earlier model used by the Galactic Empire, and was created in violation of the anti-torture laws enacted by the New Republic. An IT-000 designated IT-000-XZ 1594 was used by Kylo Ren when he began his interview with the enemy pilot Poe Dameron above the planet Jakku.
